## Source: ossf-package-analysis (75b247b7f12f2081f8f23c99b8174e0f1a6750936a7ea52825fa02e317a737e0)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'chaos-mesh-dashboard' @ 9.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
